name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Several blue and white bags triggered everyone's incorrect memories

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The recent epidemic emergency drills across the country should be derived from the "National Disease Prevention and Control Action Plan 2024-2025" recently issued by the National Center for Disease Control and Prevention.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 14, some netizens discovered that a tanker truck still had the labels of Tianjiao Chemical and Wilmar at the same time.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, in Shanghai, a father said that his child was threatened by the moral education director of Xingzhi Primary School (Dahua) in Baoshan District, Shanghai. At that time, the moral education director lied to the child and said that his punishment and file had been sent to the Education Bureau, which caused the child to have a mental breakdown and jump off the building.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: August 13, Chongqing. A rumor spread online that a delivery man was stabbed to death on the street in Nan'an District. On August 15, the police reported that the deceased was the boyfriend of the suspect's ex-wife.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: August 13, Huizhou, Guangdong. Villagers in Dahe Village, Duozhu Town reported that there was a suspected "gutter oil" workshop nearby. The site was dirty and messy, causing several nearby villages to stink. They reported it to multiple departments but no one dealt with it.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: August 14, Hangzhou, Zhejiang. A man in Xiaoshan District threw a gas tank with a knife and resisted arrest. The police reported: Dong was successfully arrested and there were no casualties at the scene.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 15, some netizens discovered that Hu Xijin's Weibo account was online, but he did not post anything.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 14, a netizen named "Renmin University Wan Jingyan" reported that Zhang Moujun, a master's student of the School of Environment in 2023, assaulted, molested and raped her while at school. The post said that after "Wan Jingyan" reported the case to the school in 2022 and submitted evidence to the police, Zhang Moujun did not receive any punishment and graduated. "Wan Jingyan" responded at around 0:00 on the 15th, saying that the incident occurred on the evening of March 10, 2022, and she had never voluntarily had sex with Zhang Moujun outside the time of the incident.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The father of the student who jumped from the building at Shanghai Xingzhi Primary School tells the story

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: According to the Ministry of Finance data on August 15, in the first half of 2024, tax revenue decreased by 5.6% and non-tax revenue increased by 11.7%. Among the 15 provinces that have announced the sub-item data of fiscal revenue and non-tax revenue, the proportion of non-tax revenue in 13 provinces has increased, with Fujian reaching the highest at 42.3%.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 13, the draft amendment to the marriage registration regulations was released for public comment. According to the draft, marriage and divorce registration no longer require household registration books, and the previous regulations on the territorial jurisdiction of registration have been cancelled. In conjunction with the Civil Code, the draft has added new regulations on a 30-day "divorce cooling-off period" and "marriage can be annulled if a serious illness is concealed before marriage", and has made specific provisions on the "divorce cooling-off period".

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: August 14 (Release) Harbin, Heilongjiang. Harbin Daowai District Prosecutor Fu Yuqiang reported in his real name that the judges and president of Daoli District People's Court had violated laws and disciplines when handling cases of violations by the Daowai District Education Rectification Office.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Just now, the U.S. Embassy and Consulate in China issued a statement
“Stand in solidarity with Ukraine. From the very beginning, this was nothing less than an aggressive war launched by the Kremlin against Ukraine.”

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, in order to protest against Nanjing middle schools using summer tutoring, it was reported online that a 17-year-old boy formed a group of 1,000 people called "Nanjing Student Anti-Tuition Alliance". He called on everyone to report the problem of tutoring in schools to the relevant departments. Later, the boy received a call from the police and was verbally educated by the police. It is now reported that the group has been disbanded, and the students who organized the opposition to tutoring have also been criticized by the tutoring parents.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: According to a report on August 15, recently, the Internet Security Brigade of Shou County Public Security Bureau in Ningde, Fujian Province, jointly with the National Security Brigade, investigated and dealt with a case of using illegal channels to conduct international Internet activities. The police found that a man named Gong was browsing overseas information and was not conducive to national security. The report also stated that any form of circumvention is illegal.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, the Ministry of National Security issued a statement: Beware! Using studying abroad as bait to lure Chinese students to be anti-China, foreign forces have gone to great lengths to infiltrate our student community. Some study abroad agencies are only pursuing economic interests, have a weak sense of national security, and are willing to cater to anti-China rhetoric.
To this, netizens responded, "Infiltrate all day long, what are you afraid of?"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: August 14, Gansu (posting place). Netizens said that a little boy was wandering outside in the middle of the night. The boy said that he ran away from home because his parents beat him. He burned and scalded him with boiling water, and calling the police was useless. The boy planned to pick up rags and save money to return to his hometown (grandmother's house).

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Earlier today, Evergreen Hotels' Wikipedia page was defaced (it has since been restored).

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 15, a Chinese protested in front of the Yasukuni Shrine in Japan with a speaker and a banner, and shouted to the Japanese standing by, "You are a coward, you don't have the courage that the Chinese have."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: August 14 (Release) Paris. Blogger "Instructor Zhang" came to Evergreen Laurel Hotel again and met the hotel manager. The manager said, "We bought it without the Chinese flag, and we have the right to decide how to decorate the hotel." However, the blogger believes that all flags include the Chinese flag. "No one sells flags without the Chinese flag.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Last year, the news that "a 9-year-old girl in Changsha had her skull broken by her teacher" attracted widespread attention. Song Mouming, a primary school teacher in Changsha, overturned the podium due to classroom discipline issues, broke a triangle ruler and smashed it on the girl's head, causing the girl to suffer from lifelong sequelae. On August 15, 2024, the mother of the injured girl, Ms. Guo, posted a video saying, "My daughter's skull was broken by a teacher with a triangle ruler. The trial will be held on August 16."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: August 14, Yulin, Shaanxi. Pollution from Xiaobaodang Coal Mine affected the water supply of nearby villagers. The villagers came to the factory to seek justice, but the security guards held sticks and some villagers were injured in the conflict.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: August 15 (Released) Shandong. It was reported online that the financial management funds of Jianghaihui Group collapsed and could not be redeemed. Investors gathered together to defend their rights and knelt down and kowtowed to the police who were maintaining stability in front of them.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: A netizen posted a message calling on everyone to stop posting political content in the discussion area of Black Myth Wukong, but was also banned by the developer.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/xCja9ZAuhD

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: August 15, Luoyang, Henan. A rider lost control of his emotions and stopped cars on the motorway to vent his anger: "Hit me to death, I don't want to live anymore!"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Some netizens made a song to satirize the incident of Zeekr Motors backstabbing an old user
